versions.description:
• Updated FSP to D.0.A8.20
  • Fixed touchpad in PS/2 mode
  • Fixed detection of USB3 hubs in Type-C ports
  • Fixed reporting of the second fan
  • Fixed using USB3 devices at USB3 speeds in all ports
  • Updated fan tables
  • Changed fans to use highest reported temperature to calculate duty instead of using the highest calculated duty across all fans
  • Changed fan mechanism from calculated interpolation/smoothing to a fixed step to limit rapid changes in duty over short periods
